title: Git MCP Server for Container Operations

comment: Pre-review compliance assessment COMPLIANT. Verified: (1) Frontmatter title="Git MCP Server for Container Operations", revision_summary="Initial draft" (acceptable per SOP-001 Section 5.1 exception for v0.1); (2) All 12 sections required by SOP-002 Section 6 are present and complete; (3) No prohibited placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) in pre-approved sections; (4) Technical content is well-structured with clear architecture, validation rules, and implementation details; (5) Testing summary covers allowed operations, chained commands, submodule blocking, destructive blocking, and error handling; (6) No typos or formatting errors detected. Recommend proceeding to pre-approval.

Post-review finding: EI-7 uses outcome 'Deferred' which is not a valid Task Outcome per SOP-002 Section 7.3. Valid outcomes are Pass or Fail only. Options to resolve: (1) Lead executes EI-7 container testing per the provided Test Protocol and updates outcome to Pass; OR (2) Mark EI-7 as Fail and attach a VAR documenting the deferral with remediation plan. All other execution items verified - files exist and content matches documented work. Deviation (git_mcp vs git-mcp directory name) is properly documented and acceptable.

Post-review compliance assessment COMPLIANT. Previous finding resolved: EI-7 now has valid Pass outcome with documented test results (4 tests: git status, git log, submodule blocking, destructive blocking - all passed, performed by lead 2026-02-04). All 9 execution items have Pass outcomes. Execution Summary documents results and two deviations: (1) directory naming git_mcp/ vs git-mcp/, (2) additional container integration work. No VARs required. No QMS documents affected. Recommend proceeding to post-approval.
